fileSamples.statement:
(PC PC' : Configuration.t) (t : Ident.t) (f_to f_from f_to' f_from' : actid -> Time.t) (smode : sim_mode) (T0 T T' : trav_label -> Prop) (EQUIV : T' ≡₁ T) (STEP : plain_step MachineEvent.silent t PC PC' \/
tc (plain_step MachineEvent.silent t) PC PC') (ST : simrel_thread G sc PC' T f_to' f_from' t smode) (SR : smode = sim_normal ->
simrel G sc PC T0 f_to f_from -> simrel G sc PC' T f_to' f_from') : (plain_step MachineEvent.silent t)＊ PC PC'.
fileSamples.proofString:
des; [eapply inclusion_r_rt | eapply inclusion_t_rt]; eauto.
done.
